Competency Question / Fact: An element can have a defect
A defect has a type of defect and a severity indicator
A defect can be detected, confirmed or not confirmed
An image in taken at a time and location
When an image has been processed, its metadata includes the type of processing
An element can have geometric quality information
A piece of geometric quality information is related to a rule and includes a value (passed or not passed) and a specification of the problem
Tags In a project have an estimated accuracy
A zone and an element can be related to a safety information
